pages.text: When you open the maid's GUI, you can see the list on the left side. This is the maid's task. The related functions are as follows:$(li)Idle: default task, do nothing.$(li)Attack: put a sword on maid's main hand, maid's behavior will be the same as the vanilla wolf, and actively attack hostile creatures.

$(li)Bow: put a bow on maid's main hand, put an arrow at any other position, will actively attack hostile creatures.$(li)Danmaku: put the gohei in maid's main hand, she will shoot danmaku to attack the hostile creatures, and launch different number danmaku according to the number of hostile creatures around her.$(li)Farm: put crop seeds on maid, actively planting crops around her, and actively harvesting.

$(li)Sugarcane: plant and harvest sugarcane.$(li)Melons: harvest watermelons and pumpkins.$(li)Cocoa: plant and harvest cocoa.$(li)Grass: clean weeds and flowers around them.$(li)Feed: put food on maid and take the initiative to feed the food when the player's hunger value is low.$(li)Shears: put the shears in maid's main hand, will actively shears the wool around the sheep.
$(li)Torch: put torch on maid, it will actively place the torch in the low brightness.$(li)Breed: put the items needed to breed animals and actively feeds the surrounding animals.
